name: Chicken Sandwiches
description: 100% Fresh chicken marinated for 12 hours in our signature blend of Louisiana herbs & spices. Then breaded and battered by hand and served in a fresh brioche bun. Your choice of Classic or SPICY!

name: Hot Wings
description: Freshly cooked spicy wings. Y'all ready for this?

name: Tenders
description: 100% Fresh chicken tenders, 12 hr marinated & hand-battered with buttermilk for our best ever shatter-crunch. Your choice of Classic or SPICY!
